root.name: Planet Alcatraz
root.description: OverviewPlanet Alcatraz is a 3D RPG developed by 1C in collaboration with Skyfallen Entertainment, released on the 31st of October, 2009. The game is played on an isometric plane, and has open world exploration elements. Is known as Dungeon Cleaners/ Erasers in Russia.The player controls Boar, a soldier for the Empire, that is undercover along with three other, sent to infiltrate the Planet Alcatraz to find out about the space shuttle being build and stop it. Separated from his comrades, Boar must survive the planet, reunite with his allies and stop the shuttleSystem RequirementsSystem RequirementsOperation system: Microsoft Windows 2000/XPDirectX: DirectX 9.0Processor: Pentium 4 or Athlon 1,4GHz+Memory: 512Mb RAM or moreHDD space: 3,5 GbSound card: DirectX 9 compatible.Graphics card: AGP GeForce 4200/Radeon 9000, 128 Mb or more
